Compares two {{tt|stop_token}} values.

{{cpp/hidden friend|std::stop_token}}

{{cpp/note synthesized eq}}

===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par|lhs, rhs|{{tt|stop_token}}s to compare}}
{{par end}} 

===Return value===
{{c|true}} if {{c|lhs}} and {{c|rhs}} have the same associated stop-state, or both have no associated stop-state, otherwise {{c|false}}.
